description: Lists the provisioned products that are available (not terminated). To use additional filtering, see  SearchProvisionedProducts.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: AccessLevelFilter
parameters.description: The access level to use to obtain results. The default is User. Key (string) --- The access level. Account - Filter results based on the account. Role - Filter results based on the federated role of the specified user. User - Filter results based on the specified user. Value (string) --- The user to which the access level applies. The only supported value is self.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The user to which the access level applies. The only supported value is self.

nested_items.name: ProvisionedProducts
nested_items.description: Information about the provisioned products.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The user-friendly name of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of provisioned product. The supported values are CFN_STACK, CFN_STACKSET, TERRAFORM_OPEN_SOURCE, TERRAFORM_CLOUD, and EXTERNAL.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the provisioned product.
AVAILABLE - Stable state, ready to perform any operation. The most recent operation succeeded and completed.
UNDER_CHANGE - Transitive state. Operations performed might not have valid results. Wait for an AVAILABLE status before performing operations.

TAINTED - Stable state, ready to perform any operation. The stack has completed the requested operation but is not exactly what was requested. For example, a request to update to a new version failed and the stack rolled back to the current version.

ERROR - An unexpected error occurred. The provisioned product exists but the stack is not running. For example, CloudFormation received a parameter value that was not valid and could not launch the stack.

PLAN_IN_PROGRESS - Transitive state. The plan operations were performed to provision a new product, but resources have not yet been created. After reviewing the list of resources to be created, execute the plan. Wait for an AVAILABLE status before performing operations.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The current status message of the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The UTC time stamp of the creation time.

nested_items.name: IdempotencyToken
nested_items.description: A unique identifier that you provide to ensure idempotency. If multiple requests differ only by the idempotency token, the same response is returned for each repeated request.

nested_items.name: LastRecordId
nested_items.description: The record identifier of the last request performed on this provisioned product.

nested_items.name: LastProvisioningRecordId
nested_items.description: The record identifier of the last request performed on this provisioned product of the following types:
ProvisionProduct.
UpdateProvisionedProduct.
ExecuteProvisionedProductPlan.
TerminateProvisionedProduct.

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulProvisioningRecordId
nested_items.description: The record identifier of the last successful request performed on this provisioned product of the following types:
ProvisionProduct.
UpdateProvisionedProduct.
ExecuteProvisionedProductPlan.
TerminateProvisionedProduct.

nested_items.name: ProductId
nested_items.description: The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa.

nested_items.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

nested_items.name: LaunchRoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the launch role associated with the provisioned product.

nested_items.name: NextPageToken
nested_items.description: The page token to use to retrieve the next set of results. If there are no additional results, this value is null.
